mapper.select: SELECT ssa.*, ssav.id vid, ssav.sale_attr_value_name FROM spu_sale_attr ssa LEFT JOIN spu_sale_attr_value ssav on ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id AND ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id where ssa.spu_id = #{spuId}

SELECT ssa.*, ssav.id vid, ssav.sale_attr_value_name, IF(skuv.sale_attr_value_id is NULL, '0', '1') as is_checked FROM spu_sale_attr ssa LEFT JOIN spu_sale_attr_value ssav ON ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id AND ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value skuv ON ssav.id = skuv.sale_attr_value_id AND skuv.sku_id = #{skuId} WHERE ssa.spu_id = #{spuId} ORDER BY ssa.base_sale_attr_id, ssav.id

SELECT a.sku_id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT sale_attr_value_id ORDER BY sale_attr_value_id SEPARATOR '|') AS value_json FROM (SELECT si.id sku_id, skuav.id vid, skuav.spu_id, skuav.sale_attr_value_id, ssav.base_sale_attr_id FROM sku_info si LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value skuav ON si.id = skuav.sku_id LEFT JOIN spu_sale_attr_value ssav ON skuav.sale_attr_value_id = ssav.id WHERE si.spu_id = 28 ORDER BY si.id, ssav.base_sale_attr_id, skuav.sale_attr_value_id) a GROUP BY a.sku_id
